definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: Mary abstracted a story for the book review.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽为这篇书评写故事梗概。

sentences.english: I read this book for a biography book report.
sentences.chinese: 为了撰写一份传记类书评，我阅读了此书。

sentences.english: Being a person who loves dogs, after seeing the book review, I immediately bought the book.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个爱狗的人，看了书评以后马上购买了此书。

sentences.english: I have to give the reviewer credit as he has had a great sense of humor about the whole incident.
sentences.chinese: 这位书评人对此所表现的幽默感，实在令我非常欣赏。

sentences.english: I was earning extra money writing articles and book reviews.
sentences.chinese: 我写文章和书评挣额外的钱。

sentences.english: See book review area someone at vomit the slot as hair don't push those female female.
sentences.chinese: 看到书评区有人在吐槽为毛不推那些女女。

sentences.english: He is abstracting a story for a book review.
sentences.chinese: 他正在为一篇书评撰写故事梗概。

sentences.english: On the criticism of novel, the criticism is mainly reflected in a number of Preface and Postscript of book reviews.
sentences.chinese: 对于小说批评，其批评主要体现在一些书评序跋中。

sentences.english: See writing reiterate district something at vomit the slot as cilia don't move those female female.
sentences.chinese: 看到书评区有人在吐槽为毛不推那些女女。

sentences.english: The critics rapped the writer for his new book.
sentences.chinese: 书评家强烈地抨击那名作家的新书。

sentences.english: Find more allergy book reviews on the WAO Website here.
sentences.chinese: WAO网站上其它的变态反应学书评见此处。

sentences.english: For this issue we have specially requested Professor Qian to write a book review.
sentences.chinese: 这一期我们特约钱教授写了一篇书评。

sentences.english: Henry's work is reading books and writing book reviews.
sentences.chinese: 亨利的工作是读读书，写写书评。

sentences.english: The reviewer's criticism was unnecessarily insulting.
sentences.chinese: 书评作者的批评没有必要这样欺侮人。

sentences.english: Most of the critics found this book absolutely enthralling .
sentences.chinese: 多数的书评对这觉得这本书相当吸引人。

definition: impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
person who writes articles - newspapers, magazines, blogs (informal)/scribe/copyist/a talented writer of articles or of calligraphy
